commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna won the sixth event for us, which makes it 4 to 2. We only need one more to win the whole thing!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The seventh contest will be a costume challenge! It will be a contest of a skill invaluable to school idols!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: No matter how good your songs and dances are, they're not great if you look like a mess! A true idol chooses costumes to match their character or songs.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: It's Kotori's turn.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I'm nervous, but I'll do my best!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Only Ayumu, Kasumi, and Rina haven't gone yet, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm not confident about my sense of fashion.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: By the way, what are we going to do after the costume contest?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: After this? Say, Nico, would you mind telling us what the eighth and ninth contests are...?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What, trying to get a leg up on us?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: C'mon, Nico-chi. Don't be so stingy and just tell them. There's only two left after this.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: One is a charisma contest, the other is an idol contest.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Charisma...?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Then I'm going to nominate myself for the idol contest. Nico is definitely going to be doing that one. I'm going to rub that confident nose of hers in it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: O-Okay... That's reassuring.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Umm. So, Rina?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina, can you do it?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Okay, I'll do it. I don't know what the charisma contest is about, but it's probably not for me.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Now that we have our contestants determined, allow me to tell you what the contest is! It's a cosplay fashion show!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Choose five people on your team and dress them up in the costumes you think are best-suited for them!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The six of you...and you. I'll let you in this time. Put in a vote for who you think has dressed their member better. Whoever gets the most votes will win.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait, I can be in it, too?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: The number of judges has to be odd. Play fair and pick the one you think is cute!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The costumes will be what we could borrow from the theater club, so use those. You have 30 minutes to choose. Now get cute!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: μ's VS Nijigasaki Thrilling Costume Fashion Show! How exciting. Let's have our first model, μ's' Honoka Kosaka.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Tadaa! I'm gonna arrest all the naughty people!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A cop costume! That's so cool!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I thought it's a nice juxtaposition between Honoka's energetic smile and her austere outfit.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I thought something cute or sporty would be better for her, but they took a completely different direction.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Next up for Nijigasaki, Karin Asaka.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Rina Tennoji! Get out here.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Don't what me! What is this?! I told you to pick out a costume!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There was nothing that looked good, so I made this. It's the world's first Rina-chan Board that Karin can use, the Karin-san Board!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: This board is mysteriously comforting.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Karin?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: How thrilling. Let's see what μ's' second model, Eli Ayase is wearing.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Welcome to the realm of gods...just kidding!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wh-Whoa, she's beautiful!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She...is like a goddess out of a myth. How beautiful!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Instead of creating a drastic contrast, I went straight with Eli's costume. It brings out her alluring beauty.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Oh, Kotori. That's embarrassing.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Even when she's embarrassed she looks great. That's so unfair. Next up for Nijigasaki is Emma Verde!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm right here!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This again?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Chuckle* It's my Emma-chan Board!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wanted to show Emma's tender nature on her board. It was harder than I thought.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Sorry Rina. Was my face difficult?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Why is this fashion show becoming so surreal?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Well, fashion shows often have very weird designs, so I'd say this is par for the course.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The winner of the μ's VS Nijigasaki Thrilling Costume Fashion Show is Kotori Minami!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Wooo! Thank you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry Rina, I didn't really get it either.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That's okay. I should be the one apologizing. If only I drew their faces better...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That wasn't the problem!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nozomi, every single one of your votes was for Nijigasaki. What were you trying to pull?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Huh? I was just voting for the ones I liked.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I don't understand your "fashion" standards, Nozomi.
